title: Can't get the hextech chest
body: There is a problem, so I got 1 Hextech chest is available but i played with my friend he got a S grade on a champion and I did not receive a  hextech chest . I'm sure he did reach S grade on that champion  before.

replies.body:
Who he played is irrelevant to you earning a chest, only that he got an S and you were in a premade.

There are a few things that would stop you getting a chest in this scenario though. You mentioned you had one available so that's an obvious check.

**Were you playing a champ on the free to play rotation that you don't own?**
 You can't earn chests for champs you don't own.

**Had you received a chest already on the champ YOU were playing? **
The chest links to the champ you're playing, and you can only earn one chest on a champ per year, so if you had already received a chest on that champ you wouldn't have received one for this game.
